en.body:
A simple clothing store. Developed using the [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) framework and the [React](https://reactjs.org/) library. The design is made using the [Sass](https://sass-scss.ru/) preprocessor. The site is completely static.

The products are distributed by gender and age . There is a shopping cart and a product search

[NetlifyCMS](https://www.netlifycms.org/) is used as a content manager.
en.title: Personal blog
